body.name: Koonie 10000mAh Waist Clip Fan with Solar Panel, 30H Working Time, Personal LED Light, Battery Powered Belt Fan, Strong Airflow, 3 Speeds, Body for Outdoor, Working, Camping, Hiking

features: 【 Solar Panel for Unlimited Power】: The first-ever portable fan comes with solar panel to power up your waist fan anytime you are outside under the sunlight. Built-in USB output to provide emergency power source for your phone. Enjoy cool breeze ready for any of your outdoor activities.

【Massive Battery Capacity】：10,000mAh battery offers up to 24 hours of continuous airflow on a full charge to keep you cool throughout the day. When fully charge the battery and solar panel, the cooling time lasts up to 30 hours. 2A fast charging supported, the fan can be fully charged in 6 hours.

【Powerful Cool Air Delivery】: Built in powerful motor to deliver much further airflow reached 5.8m/s while still runs with an unobtrusive noise down to 55dB. Select from low, medium or high speed settings to optimize airflow to suit your different needs.

【Reliable LED Light】: The waist fan doubles as LED light lasts for 30 hours on a full charge. A convenient solution in case you need a light at night; Your ideal must-have fan for camping, hiking, fishing, music festivals, and barbecue party.

【Improved Shock Protection】: Extra-thick corners offers enhanced protection against falling. Coated with premium TPU, the portable fan is specially designed for long-lasting use throughout the summer days.

2023 Cutting-Edge Waist Fan comes with the Solar Panel

Enhanced Shock Protection Powerful Cool Air Delivery The efficient motor(＜55dB ) emits super strong airflow up to 5.8m/s to save you from scorching summer heat. LED Night Light A convenient solution in case you need a light at night for outdoor exploration.
Easily Clips For Outdoor Comfort Efficiently Clips with Solar Panel

Your Emergency Source of Power Power for Days The waist fan features a massive 10,000mAh battery capacity and extra solar panel provides continuous cooling up to 30 hours. Personalized Comfort Precisely choose the most suitable speeds. Powerful and cool airflow reaches 3.2m/s-5.8m/s.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really have nothing bad to say about them they are very good. Not only a fan but also a charger I was able the charge my phone 5 time while running the fan on mid speed for the whole day unlit returning to our hotel where I later charged. I didn’t think that the sole panel did much but it does work I put it to the test by running it on high speed for about 12 hours walking on a hike and I still was showing almost full charge so it does work. Thank you for such a great product I’d highly recommend to anyone and everyone

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works great for what it is
reviews.reviewText: For what it is , it does the job . Def would purchase it again .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great wind and battery life
reviews.reviewText: For those skeptical because of the price, worth every penny. The belt alone was a deal breaker for me it's actually nice and I wear it everyday with or without the fan. Very quiet on 1st and 2nd speeds and not extremely loud on 3rd (highest) with very nice breeze. Battery life is awesome I fell asleep with it running, woke up hours later with 2 out 3 bars still left. Ive used it during the day while using it to charge my phone and still doesn't decrease battery as quickly as most power banks ive had in the past. Haven't needed to use the solar panel yet but will update when I get the chance to use it. Great buy don't settle for the cheaper ones spend a few more bucks and be satisfied with your purchase. Thank me later lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great fan but large
reviews.reviewText: The fan's great but I which the air flow direction could be adjust. Its a bit large and carrying the recharge make it even more of a inconvenience. But when you're Hot outside you will appreciate the air it can move.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice outdoor fan.
reviews.reviewText: It blows you cool air outdoor. With the belt clip that makes it hand free and stay on your waste.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This item works

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Product is down to be solar powered but the battery doesn't charge with the solar panel, possible faulty parts, definitely wouldn't recommend and not worth what i paid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great fan and power bank
reviews.reviewText: Got this for camping to use as both a solar powered power bank and to stay cool given how hot it has been this summer.Overall it is great! The solar charging it has is a bit slow but overall the fan is great! The battery capacity is decent and with the clip it works really well as a fan while hiking as well as at night. The fan has a few different speeds and can run for a really long time.
